Jemmy's Jewelry Making

- Who should be a jeweler and why: For all classes and races Jewel Crafting can be a very profitable and admirable trade to skill to acquire and specialize in. The average seasoned Jeweler will expect to make approximately 25 to 60 percent profit return on their investment. Depending on the demand for the item being crafted. However selling magically enchanted jewelry can be much more profitable as magical items will always be in much a greater demand. This is why many characters of the enchanter class wisely decide to become jewelers. They can enchant magically the metals that they use to make their jewelry making the finished product of far greater market worth. Some believe that the bar brings up Skill,ho wever once you are trivial with one gem you can create things in any type of bar with that gem. its the Gem that brings up your skill not the bar.
